in_progress.goal: Mission SQLite: Migrate Task Management to Database
in_progress.details: 1. Analyze TaskBoardManager. 2. Design a SQLite schema (tasks table with id, goal, details, status, priority, metadata). 3. Implement src/agentic/infrastructure/db.py for async DB access. 4. Refactor TaskBoardManager to use SQLite instead of JSON. 5. Create a migration script to move data from tasks.json to SQLite. 6. Ensure full compatibility with the existing Graph.

done.details: Write a simple python script that prints Hello World. Ensure it has a docstring and type hints for a main function. Also CREATE A TEST in tests/unit/test_hello.py to verify it.

done.goal: Create unit test in tests/unit/test_text_processor.py for count_vowels
done.details: Ensure it covers normal cases, case-insensitivity (if applicable), and empty strings.

done.goal: Refactor src/utils/text_processor.py to make count_vowels case-insensitive
done.details: Make sure the function handles both uppercase and lowercase vowels correctly.
